Luol Deng

Pronunciation: \Lu-owl DANG\

Luol Ajou Deng

(The Man from Sudan, Deng-erous)

Position: Small Forward and Power Forward Shoots: Right

6-9,237lb(206cm,107kg)

Born: April 16, 1985 inWau,South Sudan ss

Relatives: CousinDengGai

College: Duke

High School: Blair Academy in Blairstown, New Jersey

Recruiting Rank: 2003 (2)

Draft: Phoenix Suns, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2004 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 5, 2004

Career Length:15 years

  • 2x All Star
  • 2004-05 All-Rookie
  • 2006-07 Sportsmanship
  • 2011-12 All-Defensive

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Luol Deng?

Luol Deng is 40 years old.

Where was Luol Deng born?

Luol Deng was born in Wau, South Sudan.

When was Luol Deng born?

Luol Deng was born on April 16, 1985.

How tall is Luol Deng?

Luol Deng is 6-9 (206 cm) tall.

How much did Luol Deng weigh when playing?

Luol Deng weighed 237 lbs (107 kg) when playing.

Is Luol Deng in the Hall of Fame?

Luol Deng is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Luol Deng drafted?

Luol Deng was drafted by Phoenix Suns, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2004 NBA Draft.

What position did Luol Deng play?

Small Forward and Power Forward.

When did Luol Deng retire?

Luol Deng last played in 2019.

What is Luol Deng's net worth?

Luol Deng made at least $168,461,551 playing professional basketball.

How much did Luol Deng make?

Luol Deng made $18,000,000 in 2017.

What did Luol Deng average?

Luol Deng averaged 14.8 points, 6.1 rebounds, and 2.3 assists per game.

How many rings does Luol Deng have?

Luol Deng won 0 championships.

What schools did Luol Deng attend?

Luol Deng attended Blair Academy in Blairstown, New Jersey and Duke.

What are Luol Deng's nicknames?

The Man from Sudan, Deng-erous are nicknames for Luol Deng.
